subject: Headless CLI: validate missing option values + invalid output-format
description: Improve CLI arg parsing to require values for flags that expect them (output-format, allowed-tools, system-prompt, json-schema, resume, cwd). If missing or next token is another flag, emit a clear error and exit 1. Treat invalid output-format as an error instead of silently defaulting. Add tests that exercise each flag with missing values and invalid format.
